sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "../Cart/Cart.css" import cart from "../../../Images/cart.png" import vegicon from "../../../Images/veg-icon.png" import nonVegicon from "../../../Images/non-veg icon.png" import CartItems from '../../CartItems/CartItems' function Cart(props) { const {cartItems,onAdd,onRemove}=props const {itemsprice}= cartItems.reduce((a,c)=>a+c.Price*c.qty,0) const {itemqty}=cartItems.reduce((a,c)=>a+c.qty,0) return (

CART EMPTY

Good food is always cooking, go ahead and order some items from the menu.

Cart

{itemqty}

{ cartItems.map((item)=>{ return(
{item.Name} {/*

{item.qty}

 */}
Rs.{item.Price * item.qty}
) }) }
Subtotal : {itemsprice}
) } export default Cart
